body:
There are two types of "Unexpected indentation" errors that I'm seeing so far in the documentation. One is in the .rst files, where someone starts a new line with a space.

```
basic_usage.rst:1786: ERROR: Unexpected indentation.
```

These are easy to solve. The other is indentation problems in docstrings.

```
package_list.rst:321: WARNING: Block quote ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
```

```
/blues/gpfs/home/software/spack-0.9.1/lib/spack/spack/config.py:docstring of spack.config:11: WARNING: Enumerated list ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.
```

These will be a bit more tricky, particularly for core Spack library classes. I'll attempt to solve both of these problems.

This bug was discovered in #1576 by adding documentation testing. It will be fixed in #1576. This issue is being opened to track the problem.
title: Documentation: Unexpected indentation, Docstring indentation problems
